content:
pchickey opened PR #1445 from pch/wiggle-tests-fix-cycle to master:

Fix required for publishing crates:

  • move all wiggle's tests underneath wiggle-test crate
  • rename wiggle-test's directory from test-helpers to test, since its not just the helpers anymore
  • fix the wiggle-macro doc tests
  • add wiggle-test directly to workspace. I'm not sure why this is required, but for cargo test --package wiggle-test to work correctly, it appears that I needed to put crates/wiggle/test into the workspace, even though crates/wiggle was already present.
pchickey requested sunfishcode for a review on PR #1445.

pchickey updated PR #1445 from pch/wiggle-tests-fix-cycle to master:

Fix required for publishing crates:

  • move all wiggle's tests underneath wiggle-test crate
  • rename wiggle-test's directory from test-helpers to test, since its not just the helpers anymore
  • fix the wiggle-macro doc tests
  • add wiggle-test directly to workspace. I'm not sure why this is required, but for cargo test --package wiggle-test to work correctly, it appears that I needed to put crates/wiggle/test into the workspace, even though crates/wiggle was already present.
